column2: Job Summary: We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Sales and Marketing Representative to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for identifying new business opportunities, building relationships with customers, and driving revenue growth through effective sales and marketing strategies. Responsibilities: Sales: - Identify and pursue new sales leads - Build and maintain relationships with customers - Conduct sales calls and meetings - Negotiate and close deals - Meet or exceed sales targets - Collaborate with cross-functional teams - Stay up-to-date on industry trends and competitor activity - Continuously improve sales and marketing processes Marketing: - Develop and execute marketing campaigns - Proven track record of success in marketing roles - Excellent communication and creative skills - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills - Ability to work in a fast-paced environment - Proficiency in marketing automation platforms
column11: CRM Sales, Call Monitoring, CRM Strategy

column2: Role & responsibilities: Client Consultation: Conduct thorough consultations with clients to understand their travel preferences, interests, budget, and any special requirements. Travel Planning: Design customized travel itineraries based on clients' preferences Booking Services: Arrange flights, ensuring bookings align with clients' preferences, budget, and schedule. Travel Documentation: Assist clients with obtaining necessary travel documentation, such as passports, visas, travel insurance, and vaccination certificates, ensuring compliance with travel regulations and requirements. Customer Service: Deliver exceptional customer service throughout the travel planning process, addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and providing support before, during, and after clients' trips. Sales and Revenue Generation: Promote travel products, packages, and special offers to clients, upselling and cross-selling additional services to maximize sales and revenue. Travel Industry Trends: Stay informed about travel industry trends, destination developments, and travel regulations to provide up-to-date advice and recommendations to clients. Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, suppliers, vendors, and industry partners to ensure seamless coordination and collaboration in delivering exceptional travel experiences. Preferred candidate profile: Minimum of 1 years of hands-on experience in Galileo GDS System Previous experience in travel consulting, tour operations, hospitality, or related areas preferred. Strong passion for travel and knowledge of global destinations, cultures, and travel trends. Excellent communication, interpersonal, and customer service skills (English/Malayalam/Hindi - known languages). Proficiency in travel booking systems, reservation software, and Microsoft Office suite. Attention to detail, organizational skills, and ability to multitask in a fast-paced environment. Sales and negotiation skills to drive revenue and meet sales targets. Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in a team environment. Willingness to work flexible hours, including evenings and weekends, to accommodate client needs. Bachelors in any degree and IATA certificate holder Perks and benefits: Work-from-home opportunity Competitive salary commensurate with experience. Performance-based incentives. Opportunities for career advancement and professional development. Initial 3-months probation period. Enjoy 25 days of paid leave annually, along with an additional 7 days of sick leave.   HOW TO APPLY: If you are a driven individual with a passion for travel and meet the above requirements, we invite you to join our team at Gia Travel. Please submit your CV and a cover letter highlighting your relevant experience to  career@giatravel.co.uk  with the subject line  "Your Name - Travel Consultant".

column1: Airport Ground Staff / Air Hostess / Cargo Executive
column2: Ground Staff Ground staff refers to the personnel who work at airports and are responsible for various tasks related to the efficient functioning of an airport and ensuring the comfort and safety of passengers. Here are some common job details and responsibilities of ground staff 1. Greeting and Assisting Passengers: Welcome passengers to the check-in area with a friendly and professional demeanor. Assist passengers with the check-in process, answering questions, and providing guidance as needed. Provide information about flight details, boarding procedures, baggage allowances, and other relevant information. 2. Document Verification: Verify passengers' travel documents, including passports, visas, boarding passes, and any other required documentation. Ensure that passengers have the necessary documentation for their destination and comply with airline and immigration requirements. Check identification to ensure that passengers are the rightful holders of their travel documents. Cargo Management Duties: Cargo Handling: Supervise the efficient handling of cargo shipments, including acceptance, storage, loading, unloading, and transfer between aircraft and warehouse facilities. Documentation: Ensure accurate and timely completion of cargo documentation, including waybills, customs declarations, and other required paperwork. Security Compliance: Ensure compliance with security regulations and procedures for handling cargo, including screening, inspection, and securing of shipments. for more info kindly connect on 9820703856 h r
